label: 江家次第
対訳語: Ritual Compendium by the House of Ōe
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
説明文: An authoritative manual on the annual rites held at the imperial palace, compiled by the court scholar Ōe no Masafusa (1041-1111) (p. 344). [大江匡房]
